text: The Institut d'études culturelles et internationales is the first institute, in France, entirely devoted to cultural activities and research on cultural and intercultural issues.Institut d'études culturelles et internationales (IECI) It has three colleges (History, Letters and Languages) and two research laboratories: * The "Center for the Cultural History of Contemporary Societies"; * The Laboratory "Heritage and Cultural Dynamics". It offers Bachelors and Masters programs in these fields.VERSAILLES - IECI GUYANCOURT It is managed by the Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines University. == References == == External links == * Official Category:Education in Yvelines Category:Organizations established in 2013 Category:International relations theory
title: Institut d'études culturelles et internationales
